conocenos.title: At PSN, we do things right and are a company committed to the environment.
conocenos.description: At PSN, we are dedicated to connecting padel enthusiasts through an innovative platform that promotes competition, community, and sustainability. Our values focus on quality, inclusivity, and respect for the environment. Every match organized and product sold contributes to reducing our environmental impact, supporting reforestation and recycling initiatives. Join us to enjoy padel while caring for the planet.
conocenos.cards.calidad.title: Quality
conocenos.cards.calidad.description: We offer high-quality products and services to ensure the best padel experience.
conocenos.cards.comunidad.title: Community
conocenos.cards.comunidad.description: We foster an inclusive community where players connect, compete, and grow together.
conocenos.cards.sostenibilidad.title: Sustainability
conocenos.cards.sostenibilidad.descripti: Committed to the environment, we reduce our impact and promote sustainable practices.
conocenos.chart.title: Our Environmental Impact
conocenos.chart.description: As our community of players grows, our commitment to the environment strengthens, contributing to a more sustainable future.
conocenos.testimonials.title: What They Say About Us
conocenos.testimonials.ceo.name: Enrique Macías Moreno
conocenos.testimonials.ceo.comment: At PSN, we focus on user satisfaction, but we are proud to contribute to the environment as our community grows.
conocenos.testimonials.user1.name: Ana García López
conocenos.testimonials.user1.comment: PSN has allowed me to find amazing padel partners and contribute to a greener planet.
conocenos.testimonials.user2.name: Carlos Martínez Ruiz
conocenos.testimonials.user2.comment: The platform is super intuitive, and I love knowing that every match helps the environment.
conocenos.testimonials.user3.name: Laura Fernández Díaz
conocenos.testimonials.user3.comment: Playing padel with PSN is fun, and I'm motivated knowing we support sustainable initiatives.
conocenos.testimonials.user4.name: Miguel Sánchez Torres
conocenos.testimonials.user4.comment: PSN has transformed my padel experience, and I'm proud to be part of its environmental mission.

redeem.title: Redeem Points
redeem.custom_grip_success: Congratulations! We will contact you to send your custom grip to your address.
redeem.coaching_sessions_success: Congratulations! We will contact you to schedule your 2 personalized coaching sessions.
redeem.psn_pack_success: Congratulations! We will contact you to send the PSN Pack (Cap, Sweatshirt, Backpack, Towel, Overgrip, Ball Pack) to your address.
redeem.high_performance_paddle_success: Congratulations! We hope this high-performance paddle helps improve your results. Put it to the test in our ranking!
redeem.prize_message: Congratulations! We will send your {prize} to your address soon.
redeem.no_prize_message: Better luck next time! Keep playing to earn more points.

banner.texth2: Play on courts around the world and find players at your level.

sponsors.title: Sponsors
sponsors.banner_text: Driving the future of padel and the environment with the support of our sponsors
Head.h2Text: Head not only helps us with their pressurizers to make our balls last longer, but with their Head Rethink initiative, they have developed a comprehensive system to support the environment in various ways. We encourage you to follow in their footsteps, https://www.head.com/es_ES/rethink
SantaLu.h2Text: It is an honor that great companies like Santalucía Seguros take initiatives to sponsor such important players as Alejandra Salazar. From PSN, we thank you for your support and for continuing to make women's paddle tennis grow unstoppable.
gatorade.h2Text: From PSN and with the help of PepsiCo, we know that matches can be very demanding and that there’s nothing better for your health and enjoyment than refreshing yourself with a Gatorade during your games.
Leroy.h2Text: For true padel lovers, we encourage you to decorate your living room with the colors of your favorite sport, so that when you watch your idols play, you feel like you're on the court.
